actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to authorize representation of, and production of documents by, the Senate Committee on Intelligence in the case of United States v. Barnett.

summary.text: Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent the Select Committee on Intelligence in the case of United States v. Barnett. Authorizes the Chairman and Vice Chairman of the Select Committee on Intelligence to provide, under appropriate security controls, copies of documents relevant to the case.

titles.title: A resolution to authorize representation of, and production of documents by, the Senate Committee on Intelligence in the case of United States v. Barnett.
